text: Grzegorz Wdowiak (born 20 November 1970) is a Polish rower. He competed in the men's lightweight double sculls event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw
title: Grzegorz Wdowiak
